channel.title: Get your business internet ready
channel.description: Recent content on Get your business internet ready

item.title: emailatyourowndomain
item.description: July 25, 2017 Guide to getting email at your own Domain Having a custom business email address is very important as part of your branding strategy. In today's Internet enviroment it also acts as your your online identity, essentially your passport that's used to login to most websites & apps you use. So, where do we begin? What you need to know Business email should never be down.

item.title: whatshouldiusetohostemailatmyowndomain
item.description: intro: Email is the most important online service that we use today. Everyone has an e-mail account on Gmail, Yahoo, Rediff and Hotmail. It is your passport on the online space used to access to most apps and websites, but itâ€™s often neglected. Today, in the year 2016, there is no business without e-mail accounts. Almost a majority of large enterprises, mid-size businesses, non-profit organizations, public administrations and small businesses have their email address that contains the name of their business.

item.title: pay
item.description: You are paying a one time service fee of USD$500 for: 1 Year registration of a new domain name. $30/year for further renewals Set up of 1 infrastructure management email address, infra@yourdomain.com which we will use for registering & managing all other services. Control of account will be handed over to you once job is done. Set up of 1 administrator email address, yourname@yourdomain.com. Which you can use to create up to 24 more free email addresses.

item.title: thanks
item.description: Tanks for your payment. While waiting for our account manager to contact you, you can take a look at http://themes.gohugo.io/ to see what kind of layout you like. If you do not have photos available, free beautiful images are available at http://www.unsplash.com and http://www.pexel.com. Thats where we usually go to to get images for our customers. You should expect to get an email within the next working day.
